statements: DELETE FROM ProjectDeadlines WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
DELETE FROM TaskList WHERE task_id = 10 AND task_deadline < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM ProjectDeadlines WHERE deadline_date < '2022-12-15' AND project_name = 'Project X';
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1 AND task_name = 'Task 1';
DELETE FROM user_tasks WHERE user_id = 123 AND task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM tasks WHERE deadline_date < '2022-09-30');
DELETE FROM task_lists WHERE id = 1 AND status = 'Incomplete';
DELETE FROM user_tasks WHERE user_id = 2 AND completed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM tasks_assigned WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
